    Publications

    • Cash Transfer and the Labor Supply of Vulnerable Households and Individuals: Does Household Indebtedness Matter? A Triple DiD Analysis

      Onyina, K. & Turkson, D. (2024). Cash Transfer and the Labor Supply of Vulnerable Households and Individuals: Does Household Indebtedness Matter? A Triple DiD Analysis (July 09, 2024). SSRN: Working Paper.

    • Impact of Alcohol Use on Academic Performance Among College Students: The Case of Acute and Chronic Drinking

      Turkson, D. (2024). Impact of Alcohol Use on Academic Performance Among College Students: The Case of Acute and Chronic Drinking (November 01, 2024). SSRN: Working Paper.

    • Maternal Education and Child Malnutrition: Evidence from selected West African countries

      Yorke, F.R., Wahab, S., & Turkson, D. (2023). Maternal education and child malnutrition: evidence from selected West African countries. SN Social Sciences, 3 (200): 1-30.

    • Tax compliance in Ghana: Does Corruption and Trust in the Government matter?

      Nyarkpoh, M.K., Turkson, D., & Buaka, E.S. (2023). Tax compliance in Ghana: does corruption and trust in the government matter? SN Social Sciences, 3 (155): 1-18.

    • Cash Transfer and Multidimensional Child Poverty: Evidence from Ghana

      Osei, K.B., & Turkson, D. (2022). Cash Transfer and Multidimensional Child Poverty: Evidence from Ghana. International Journal of Social Economics, 49 (5): 744-764.

    • Government Policies and Firm Performance in the COVID-19 Pandemic Era: A Sectoral Analysis

      Turkson, D., Addai, N.B., Chowdhury, F., & Mohammed, F. (2021). Government Policies and Firm Performance in the COVID-19 Pandemic Era: A Sectoral Analysis. SN Business Economics, 1(12): 1-22.
